00048 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 void BackgroundDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00050 {
00051         CPropertyPage::DoDataExchange(pDX);
00052         // convert frames to seconds
00053         double sec_m_initStage, sec_m_staleCutoff, sec_m_removeStaleFreq;
00054         if (!pDX->m_bSaveAndValidate) {
00055                 sec_m_initStage = doc->trackermodel.Frames2Seconds(m_initStage);
00056                 sec_m_staleCutoff = doc->trackermodel.Frames2Seconds(m_staleCutoff);
00057                 sec_m_removeStaleFreq = doc->trackermodel.Frames2Seconds(m_removeStaleFreq);
00058         }
00059         
00060         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_CDMAX, m_CDmax);
00061         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_BDMIN, m_BDmin);
00062         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_BDMAX, m_BDmax);
00063 
00064         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_THERMALMIN, m_ThermalMin);
00065         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_THERMALMAX, m_ThermalMax);
00066         
00067 
00068         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_MINAGE, m_minAge );
00069         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_TRACKAFTERAGE, m_trackAfterAge );
00070         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_TRACKAFTERPERCENTAGE, m_trackAfterAgePercentage );
00071         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_UPDATEFREQ, m_updateFreq);
00072         
00073         DDX_Radio(pDX, IDC_RADIOLEARNING, m_mode);
00074         DDX_Check(pDX, IDC_ERODE, m_Erode);
00075         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_ERODESIZE, m_ErodeSize);
00076         DDX_Check(pDX, IDC_DILATE, m_Dilate);
00077         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_DILATESIZE, m_DilateSize);
00078 
00079         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_INITFORNFRAMES, sec_m_initStage);
00080         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_STALECUTOFF, sec_m_staleCutoff);
00081         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_CLEANSTALEEVERY, sec_m_removeStaleFreq);
00082 
00083         // convert seconds to frames 
00084         if (pDX->m_bSaveAndValidate) {
00085                 m_initStage = doc->trackermodel.Seconds2Frames(sec_m_initStage);
00086                 m_staleCutoff = doc->trackermodel.Seconds2Frames(sec_m_staleCutoff);
00087                 m_removeStaleFreq = doc->trackermodel.Seconds2Frames(sec_m_removeStaleFreq);
00088         }
00089 
00090         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_CDmax, 0, 255);
00091         DDV_MinMaxDouble(pDX, m_BDmin, 0, 0.99);
00092         DDV_MinMaxDouble(pDX, m_BDmax, 1, 9.99);
00093         DDV_MinMaxDouble(pDX, m_initStage, 0, 10000000);
00094         DDV_MinMaxDouble(pDX, m_staleCutoff, 1, 10000000);
00095         DDV_MinMaxDouble(pDX, m_removeStaleFreq, 1, 10000000);
00096         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_minAge, 0, 100);
00097         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_trackAfterAge, 0, 10000000 );
00098         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_trackAfterAgePercentage, 0, 100);
00099         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_ErodeSize, 1, 10);
00100         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_DilateSize, 1, 10);
00101 
00102         UpdateControls();
00103 }

00105 void BackgroundDialog::UpdateControls() {
00106         switch (m_mode) {
00107                 case 0:
00108                         GetDlgItem(IDC_INITFORNFRAMES)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00109                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTLEARNING1)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00110                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN1)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00111                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN2)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00112                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN3)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00113                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TRACKAFTERAGE)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00114                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TRACKAFTERPERCENTAGE)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00115                         break;
00116                 case 1:
00117                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN1)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00118                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN2)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00119                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN3)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00120                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TRACKAFTERAGE)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00121                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TRACKAFTERPERCENTAGE)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00122                         GetDlgItem(IDC_INITFORNFRAMES)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00123                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTLEARNING1)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00124         };
00125 
00126 }
